186006728.review: El juego visualmente está muy bien y para los que hemos jugado a Warhammer Fantasy es ideal. En mi caso el problema es que no suelo jugar con otras personas y los personajes de mi equipo los maneja el PC, y a la hora de recoger tomos y poder cumplir contratos en el juego estoy muy limitado. Los contratos son esenciales para poder desbloquear equipación de más nivel con más habilidades, que me permitan poder jugar niveles con más dificultad y también con mejores premios.La dificultad del juego es enorme si vas a jugar solo, y te vas a frustrar tanto que al final dejarás de jugar a este juego.

185980515.review:
[h1]Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide[/h1]
[h3][Positives][/h3]
- Satisfying Left 4 Dead inspired gameplay.
- Fun co-op.
- There’s a good amount of class and weapon variety.
- Despite taking lots of inspiration from Left 4 Dead, it has enough features and mechanics to make it feel unique.
- Challenging gameplay.
- Has a solid main campaign as well as a Last Stand wave based survival mode.
- Snowy maps have snow covered models for vermin which is a nice detail.
- The DLC maps are solid.
- Goes on pretty good sales.

[h3][Mixed][/h3]
- Okay graphics and art style. Some of it looks good, but some looks a bit cheap.
- Inconsistent quality. Some levels feel really solid and polished, others can feel a bit rough.
- The story is pretty minimal and only exists to push along the gameplay. Not necessarily a bad thing, but don’t expect much plot.
- Mediocre optimization. It doesn’t run terribly, but you would expect higher performance given the dated graphics.

[h3][Negatives][/h3]
- The game is online-only.
-  Playing solo isn’t actually offline. You won’t be able to pause and if you lose connection, you’ll be booted from your game.
- The team AI is terrible. They constantly get stuck, they don’t have quick reflexes, they won’t always prioritize helping players, etc.
- The game doesn’t do the best job at explaining some of it’s mechanics.
- The loot system is very RNG and grindy.
- It could use more polish. There’s some areas where you can see out of bounds into the void.
- A few missions aren’t great.
-  $30 is too expensive for what it is.

[h3][Conclusion][/h3]
Vermintide is essentially a janky Warhammer-themed Left 4 Dead clone.  It’s a pretty fun co-op game despite it’s rough edges. Get it on sale with some friends.
7/10

185733066.review:
Une copie carbone de Left 4 Dead à la sauce Warhammer et ce n'est pas une critique. La formule L4D n'a pas été tant que ça exploité avec succès, donc ça fait plaisir !

Positif :
+ tous les bons points d'une partie de Left 4 Dead puisqu'il s'en inspire très fortement
+ les bots IA corrects rendent possible le fait d'y jouer à 2 au lieu de 4 sans se sentir pénalisé
+ un système de loot et de craft assez poussé
+ des niveaux de difficultés qui ne rigolent pas dès qu'on s'éloigne de "facile" ou "normal"

Négatif :
- missions inégales, parfois très courtes et basiques, parfois très longues et épiques
- système de DLC assez abusif
- les niveaux et le craft sont trop lents, ce qui force à refaire chaque mission 800 fois si on veut en profiter vraiment

К сожалению мёртвый онлайн. За полтора часа встретил только одного человека.  
Весь онлайн во второй части.

При покупке этой части , во второй дают 4 скина на первые классы. В принципе уже приятно, за 75+- рублей получить 4 неплохих скина. Но увы, игра покупалась не для этого, по этому от меня отрицательный отзыв.

Советую эту игру покупать по скидке и только в том случае, если вам нужны скины во вторую часть игры или у вас есть с кем поиграть в коопе. Ну или если вы любитель побегать с овощными ботами и таскать все бочки самостоятельно. =)

184690014.review:
One of the best things about pure coop games is the wholesome community. I can't remember a single time I had a bad experience in Warhammer Vermintide. People were just having fun, is all i remember. Even in the Red Moon Inn, we were always waiting patiently for teammates to come back and continue the adventure, sometimes having a little chat between. It's one of the rare cases where I don't mind that it's a poorly lit room, and in fact the candle lighting creates quite a serene atmosphere.

The game itself is excellent. The melee-focused gameplay makes combat more personal than something like Left 4 Dead. The animations are very well done, which is essential for this type of game. You can become really good by learning to anticipate the movements. Besides, there's the option to grind better equipment, but this is not really crucial, and having legendary equipment will NOT make you invincible, not at all in fact. There are also guns and bows, but these have to be used sparingly, as the ammo doesn't last. So you simply have to learn to slice those rats one way or another. 

For me, the most fun part was doing the achievements for this game. They're extremely challenging, but if you persevere, you WILL get that one lucky run where you have 4 speed potions and lucky item re-use chance and can sprint so fast to the Bell, you hardly know where you are going. Without a doubt this was the most epic and unforgettable moment in all of my gaming life. I always think about it laughing out loud when I look back at this game. GLORIOUS game design. I think every game needs to have some mechanic that becomes ludicrous when you're lucky. Just to reward perseverance.

Characters in this game are superb. My favorite is Victor Saltzpyre and his line "Bless this ravaged body!". It's something about his voice texture and intonation that's so on point, it makes me laugh every time he says anything really.
Bless the voice actors in this game!
Bless everyone at Fatshark for designing, writing, and producing such a special experience!

and
Bless mushufasa, one of the most wonderful people I had the privilege to play with. Both friendly and skilled. he is the true protagonist of Vermintide, and helped me, and many others, significantly with the Hornblower (Cataclysm) achievement and other achievements.

183581401.review:
Nonsense. Not meant to be played in single player. You get a dozen of missions which you finish in a day or two of afternoon playing. The story line is not that stitched together. Basically it is only good to play with other players and, somehow as of now, my game lobby is empty and I do not see any games to join. Level up system is nonsense and doesn't improve anything. Item improvement system is nonsense and practically doesn't improve anything but also is kind of expensive. After finishing most of the quest you get access to special tasks like, complete a level at the NIGHTMARE level which is practically impossible to do playing with bots.  That's it/ you are doomed to play the ~10 levels again and again on easy to hard level and slowly improve your weapon to still suck. 
But it looks good and the first hours of gameplay were kinda dynamic. I'm glad I didn't pay the full price.
